name: posts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool patreon.
Tool description: Search Creators and get their details and posts from Patreon (Unofficial)
API description: Get posts of a Creator with the `creator_id`. The `cursor` to the next page will be returned with this request.

creator_id.description: The `creator_id`can be obtained using the `/search` endpoint.

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination to the next page of results. Defaults to None.

amount.description: The `amount`of posts to be returned. Default is `10`. Max is `500`. Bigger amount results in higher response time.
